
## Compile notes

```{r, echo=TRUE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, results='markup', cache=FALSE}
  test_id_date <- dplyr::select(samples, id, date)  # get id and date

  notes_1 <- dplyr::select(cal_1, date, notes) %>%
             dplyr::filter(!is.na(notes)) %>%
             dplyr::left_join(test_id_date, by = "date") %>%
             dplyr::mutate(inst = "fivegas")

  notes_2 <- dplyr::select(cal_2, date, notes) %>%
             dplyr::filter(!is.na(notes)) %>%
             dplyr::left_join(test_id_date, by = "date") %>%
             dplyr::mutate(inst = "co2")

  notes_3 <- dplyr::select(data_1, date, notes) %>%
             dplyr::filter(!is.na(notes)) %>%
             dplyr::left_join(test_id_date, by = "date") %>%
             dplyr::mutate(inst = "all")

  notes_4 <- dplyr::select(data_2, date, notes) %>%
             dplyr::filter(!is.na(notes)) %>%
             dplyr::left_join(test_id_date, by = "date") %>%
             dplyr::mutate(inst = "all")

  notes_5 <- dplyr::select(grav, id, notes) %>%
             dplyr::filter(!is.na(notes)) %>%
             dplyr::left_join(test_id_date, by = "id") %>%
             dplyr::mutate(inst = "all")

  notes_6 <- dplyr::select(trans_merged, id, notes) %>%
             dplyr::filter(!is.na(notes)) %>%
             dplyr::left_join(test_id_date, by = "id") %>%
             dplyr::mutate(inst = "trans")

  notes <- dplyr::bind_rows(notes_1, notes_2, notes_3, notes_4, notes_5, notes_6) %>%
           dplyr::filter(grepl("^[0-9]|^G[0-9]", id)==TRUE) %>%
           dplyr::mutate(id = as.factor(id))
```

## Break out instruments

```{r, echo=TRUE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, results='markup', cache=FALSE}
  notes <- dplyr::mutate(notes, inst = ifelse(grepl("5-Gas", notes), "fivegas", inst)) %>%
           dplyr::mutate(inst = ifelse(grepl("E filter ruptured", notes), "ecoc", inst)) %>%
           dplyr::mutate(inst = ifelse(grepl("SOME PM STUCK|dropped filter", notes), "grav", inst)) %>%
           dplyr::mutate(inst = ifelse(grepl("Carbonyl tubing became clogged", notes), "ions", inst)) %>%
           dplyr::mutate(inst = ifelse(grepl("SMPS", notes), "smps", inst)) %>%
           dplyr::mutate(inst = ifelse(grepl("^White", notes), "trans", inst)) %>%
           dplyr::mutate(inst = ifelse(grepl("^Canister|canister", notes), "voc", inst)) %>%
           dplyr::mutate(inst = ifelse(grepl("Real time and carbonyl", notes), "pax:smps:fivesgas:co2:ions", inst)) %>%
           dplyr::mutate(inst = ifelse(grepl("white/orange", notes), "trans:ecoc", inst)) %>%
           dplyr::mutate(inst = ifelse(grepl("two filter weights were switched", notes), "grav:trans:ecoc", inst)) %>%
           dplyr::mutate(inst = ifelse(grepl("extra gunk on filter|
                                             Filters in the wrong cassettes|
                                             Filter cassettes were mislabled|filter cassettes were mislabeled",
                                             notes), "trans:ecoc:pah:ions:carb", inst)) %>%
           dplyr::distinct() %>%
           dplyr::arrange(inst)
```

## Create qc flag

With default value `bad`.

```{r, echo=TRUE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, results='markup', cache=FALSE}
  notes <- dplyr::mutate(notes, qc = factor("bad", c("bad", "maybe", "ok")))
```

## Combine with kb notes

```{r, echo=TRUE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, results='markup', cache=FALSE}
  notes_kb <- load_qc_kb("../data/logs/aim_1_qaqc.csv", "*")

  notes <- dplyr::bind_rows(notes, notes_kb) %>%
           dplyr::mutate(id = as.factor(id))
```

## Adjust some flags based on notes

```{r, echo=TRUE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, results='markup', cache=FALSE}
  notes$qc <- "bad"
  notes$qc[1:9] <- "maybe"
  notes$qc[15:16] <- "maybe"
  notes$qc[17:22] <- "ok"
  notes$qc[23:27] <- "maybe"
```

